summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for August 15, 2019. It details routine prison operations, staff shortages, inmate movements, and notably records the placement of inmate Martin (#71374-054) in the Special Housing Unit for a serious assault on staff at MDC Brooklyn. The report was created the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility.

events.title: Inmate Martin Assault on Staff
events.description: Inmate Martin (#71374-054) was placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for a serious assault on staff at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Brooklyn.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Operations
events.description: Routine prison operations including staff shortages leading to vacated posts, new inmate admissions and releases, and SHU placements.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: This is a routine prison operations report from MCC New York dated August 16, 2019, detailing activities from the previous day (August 15, 2019).
The report notes significant staff shortages across all shifts (Morning, Day, Evening Watch), leading to vacated correctional assignments.
Inmate Martin (#71374-054) was placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for a 'serious assault on staff' that occurred at MDC Brooklyn.
The document lists multiple inmate admissions, releases, and SHU placements, providing a snapshot of prison population movement.
The report was created one day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility (MCC New York), though his name is not mentioned in this specific document.
